summary: Converted the DAM test page into a production dashboard: added document list, stats, provider breakdown, and integrated live GigaChat triggers via new /api/dam/documents and /api/dam/dashboard-stats endpoints. Tweaked analysis status API + serializers to expose rich metadata.
current_status: Dashboard at /dam/test/ now lists accessible documents with AI status, allows triggering analysis, and renders detailed metadata using GigaChat results.
